## ü§ñ AI Industry Snapshot - 2025-11-13

### Top AI Stories

1. [Google‚Äôs 5 Day AI course!](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-7I0X8wChWk)

2. [From data to decision: The future of AI and automation in Financial Services](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9iKN_wIo_m8)

3. [@meta's Yann LeCun on the ‚Äúbubble‚Äù surrounding LLMs #artificialintelligence #machinelearning](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CFH2uHTPBh0)

4. [What Are LLM Applications Beyond Text Generation? - AI and Machine Learning Explained](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R1q6LN6NcQQ)

5. [Types of LLMS](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hi_yeJHbZhk)

6. [Experiments in LLMs ‚Äì Everything I've learned (so far) ‚Äì Part One ‚Äì Fine tuning](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36381832)

7. [Experiments in LLMs ‚Äì OpenAI Functions](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36534635)

8. [Experiments in LLMs ‚Äì Vector DBs and Embeddings](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36447740)

9. [Show HN: AI-Powered Twitter Filter](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39210964)

10. [Show HN: AI/ML Weekly Digest ‚Äì Curated by LLM, Summarized and Sentiment-Analyzed](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37954932)

### AI Trends Summary

Google has launched a 5-day AI course aimed at educating participants on the fundamentals and applications of artificial intelligence. In the financial services sector, there's a growing emphasis on leveraging AI and automation for more efficient decision-making processes. Meanwhile, Yann LeCun of Meta has raised concerns about a "bubble" surrounding Large Language Models (LLMs), pointing to hype versus practical utility. Despite skepticism, there is exploration into the diverse applications of LLMs beyond text generation, including in areas like data analysis and creative content creation. Additionally, there's an ongoing effort to categorize and understand the various types of LLMs, emphasizing the technology's complexity and potential across different fields.

## üíº Business News - 2025-11-13

### Top Stories

1. [LARRY KUDLOW: Democratic attempts to sabotage the Trump boom are failing miserably](https://www.foxbusiness.com/politics/larry-kudlow-democratic-attempts-sabotage-trump-boom-failing-miserably)

2. [Toyota opens massive North Carolina battery plant, confirms $10B US investment](https://www.foxbusiness.com/markets/toyota-opens-massive-north-carolina-battery-plant-confirms-10b-us-investment)

3. [Travel chaos erupts after Marriott-backed hotel chain plans bankruptcy: report](https://www.foxbusiness.com/fox-news-travel/travel-chaos-erupts-after-marriott-backed-hotel-chain-plans-bankruptcy-report)

4. [Disney losing $30M a week as YouTube TV blackout drags on, analysts say](https://www.foxbusiness.com/markets/disney-losing-30m-week-youtube-tv-blackout-drags-on-analysts-say)

5. [National Debt Tracker: American taxpayers (you) are now on the hook for $38,125,731,687,631.03 as of 11/12/25](https://www.foxbusiness.com/economy/us-national-debt-tracker)

6. [Dow closes above 48,000 for first time, 17th record close of 2025](https://www.foxbusiness.com/markets/dow-soars-past-48000-first-time-history-amid-continuing-market-rally-surge-wednesday)

7. [Lisa Su says AMD is moving at an 'incredible pace' as the chipmaker's value explodes](https://www.foxbusiness.com/media/lisa-su-says-amd-moving-incredible-pace-chipmakers-value-explodes)

8. [Pirro announces Scam Center Strike Force to target Chinese organized crime](https://www.foxbusiness.com/politics/pirro-announces-scam-center-strike-force-target-chinese-organized-crime)

9. [How much this year's Thanksgiving feast could cost you](https://www.foxbusiness.com/lifestyle/how-much-years-thanksgiving-feast-could-cost-you)

10. [Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent predicts ‚Äòblockbuster‚Äô year for US economy, relief for workers](https://www.foxbusiness.com/media/treasury-secretary-scott-bessent-predicts-blockbuster-year-for-us-economy-relief-for-workers)

### Summary

Larry Kudlow criticizes Democratic efforts against the Trump economic boom, highlighting their lack of success. Meanwhile, Toyota's expansion in the U.S. with a $10 billion investment in a North Carolina battery plant signifies a significant boost to the American manufacturing sector. Travel disruptions have been sparked by a Marriott-affiliated hotel chain's bankruptcy plans, causing widespread concern. Disney is experiencing substantial financial losses, amounting to $30 million a week, due to the ongoing blackout with YouTube TV, underscoring the impact of media distribution disputes. Lastly, the National Debt Tracker reveals a staggering figure of over $38 trillion owed by American taxpayers, highlighting a critical and escalating issue of national financial responsibility.

tech_news.markdown:
## üíª Tech News - 2025-11-13

### Top Stories

1. [¬£220 'for a cut-up sock' ‚Äî Apples's new iPhone Pocket ridiculed online](https://www.bbc.com/news/articles/cn97ndgpnq7o)

2. [Show HN: Guardian for Wild Mushroom Safety](https://mushroomcheck.com)

3. [Strongest solar flare of 2025, sparking radio blackouts across Africa and Europe](https://www.space.com/astronomy/sun/sun-unleashes-strongest-solar-flare-of-2025-sparking-radio-blackouts-across-africa-and-europe)

4. [Cloud Native Heroku Magic](https://www.heroku.com/blog/heroku-cloud-native-buildpacks/)

5. [LA might use sortition for its charter reform process](https://www.rewritela.org)

6. [The Murchison Murders](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Murchison_Murders)

7. [Ivory Coast response to YouTube scammer](https://twitter.com/Alainlobog/status/1985407337239330876)

8. [Show HN: Made MadLibs-style game to play with my kids](https://www.storygaps.org/)

9. [Helios: A 98-qubit trapped-ion quantum computer](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.05465)

10. [Security Toolkit, a comprehensive collection of security tools and resources](https://www.securitytoolkits.com/)

### Summary

1. Apple's launch of the iPhone Pocket, priced at ¬£220 and likened to a "cut-up sock" by critics, has sparked a wave of ridicule across the internet, highlighting consumer skepticism toward perceived overpriced accessories.
2. A new app, Guardian, presented on Hacker News, aims to enhance wild mushroom foraging safety by helping users identify potentially dangerous species, showcasing innovation in leveraging technology for public health and safety.
3. In 2025, the strongest recorded solar flare caused widespread radio blackouts across Africa and Europe, emphasizing the growing concern over solar activity's impact on Earth's technological infrastructure.
4. The "Cloud Native Heroku Magic" represents a significant development in cloud computing, offering scalable, efficient solutions that continue to evolve, demonstrating the sector's ongoing innovation and its critical role in modern software deployment.
5. Los Angeles is considering the use of sortition for its charter reform process, a novel approach that could introduce a more randomized, representative selection of individuals for public
